Forum The Global Community Advancing Virtual Care
Forum header image
Forum 2022 featured countless perspectives from global leaders on the trends that are shaping the healthcare industry. Explore this year’s top insights here <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/article/forum-2022-perspectives/?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=per&utm_term=registrant]]>, including the session briefs below.
Equitable well-being: Supporting communities through innovation and collaboration Bechara Choucair, MD with Kaiser Permanente, shares new, sustainable strategies that go beyond identifying populations at risk for health threats, averting crises and enabling precision community health at scale. Learn more <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/video/forum-2022-equitable-wellbeing/?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=gs3a&utm_term=registrant]]>
What you need to know about virtual-first benefit plans Leaders at Aon, Priority Health and Trustmark Health explore strategies for delivering health plans with embedded virtual primary care to employers and individuals—helping curb rising healthcare costs while optimizing their benefit offerings. Learn more <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/video/forum-2022-virtual-benefit-plans/?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=pp6&utm_term=registrant]]>
Leveling the playing field: Access to care for rural and underserved communities Three health systems—Geisinger, Teledigm Health & Bryan Telemedicine, and Charleston Area Medical Center—share their experiences and success stories using virtual health to increase access in underserved communities. Learn more <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/video/forum-2022-rural-care-access/?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=pp3&utm_term=registrant]]>
